entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
